page.title: 03Housing
page.content: In our first square {A1}we find a complete variation of house types and ages of property.The area has older property built in the 1930's which comprise of semi-detatched houses and bungalows.These are located very close to {Three Bridges Railway station} which provided good links with both London and the South Coast. The streets in this part of the grid have been named after poets {e.g. Byron {Close, Tennyson Closeand Wordsworth Close. The more recent developments having been built since {World War2} are terraced or semi-detatched in design and were originally built for the {Commission of New Towns.}These pro perties were originally rented to families who moved to Crawley in the 1950's, however many have since been purchased by the tenant.These homes are near Crawley Industrial Estate.
